bill_title: H.R.1366 - 119th Congress (2025-2026): Mining Regulatory Clarity Act | Congress.gov | Library of Congress
brief_summary: Shown Here: Reported to House (11/25/2025) Mining Regulatory Clarity Act This bill allows mining operators to use federal lands for activities ancillary to mining, such as waste disposal, regardless of whether those lands contain mineral deposits valuable enough to be mined (mineral validity). It also establishes the Abandoned Hardrock Mine Fund.
